snippet: Tuesday’s highlights from around the web include the story of how a hack brought Foursquare back from the dead. Plus, another segment in an excellent series on cellphone thefts.
abstract: Tuesday’s highlights from around the web include the story of how a hack brought Foursquare back from the dead. Plus, another segment in an excellent series on cellphone thefts.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Foursquare Regains Its Place, and How a Colombian Cartel Got Your Phone
